data.text:
"The Russian invasion has shaken the foundations of the European security architecture to its core."

Amid the war in Ukraine, UN political chief @DicarloRosemary calls for even closer collaboration between UN & @OSCE. https://t.co/PL9YvikUSo https://t.co/vCdh7wKlXb

"Whatever the outcome, this war will have no winners, only losers."

@antonioguterres warns that further escalation of the war in Ukraine threatens all of humanity. https://t.co/bHRLmhfwCt https://t.co/0ShfApPyYE

Yemen: 17.4+ million people are food insecure in the country, with 1.6 million more at risk of emergency levels of hunger in the coming months.

@WFP warns mass starvation & famine will likely take place without additional funding. https://t.co/xZYSKIzZaV

"We need peace.

 Peace for the people of Ukraine.

 Peace for the world. 

 We need peace now."

-- @antonioguterres https://t.co/J04zzaBAYc https://t.co/vyUXyxNLs5

Ukraine: Attacks on health care facilities & workers must end immediately. 

Targeting the most vulnerable – babies, children, pregnant women & those suffering from illness  – is an act of unconscionable cruelty. #NotATarget https://t.co/c8Pgh6Xgd2

We all have a role to play in stopping the spread of harmful disinformation online, which can result in people being left uninformed, unprotected & vulnerable during a crisis.

 #PledgetoPause and verify facts before sharing. https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/fE14niZvIZ

The UN's largest annual gathering of gender equality champions kicks off on Monday. 

Follow @UN_CSW for more on this year's Commission on the Status of Women. https://t.co/i9CFVCi5gi #CSW66 https://t.co/lphR123GVG

Ethiopia: Worsening drought conditions have left 7 million people in dire need of food assistance.

Families have been forced from their homes, hundreds of thousands of livestock have died & food production has been severely hampered.

https://t.co/BnPlaDMNAz via @UNOCHA https://t.co/jluHeOl3M2

➡️Seeking asylum is a human right.
➡️Getting an education is a human right.
➡️Having a nationality is a human right.
➡️Being together with family is a human right.

More on what it means to seek asylum. https://t.co/EaFNMwMsgy via @Refugees https://t.co/2kSNtIGYrk

📷: The "Good Defeats Evil" Sculpture at UNHQ depicts St. George slaying a dragon created from fragments of nuclear missiles.

To achieve a peaceful and sustainable future, the world must be free of nuclear weapons. https://t.co/KqhljE4HPB

When and how is a new @UNPeacekeeping operation formed?

The Security Council decides on new missions and their mandates. 

Get more details here: https://t.co/yS5VxBfWQR https://t.co/p6kVjjFvkI

📸: Original manuscript of the UN Charter (1945). 

The use of force by one country against another is wrong and against the Charter.

The values of the Charter must prevail.

https://t.co/swaalYI5Cr https://t.co/Nh3V0Yql3m

Stop killing and injuring children.

Children in Ukraine are being profoundly traumatized by the war.

They need peace -- now.

https://t.co/KA9opcxlqV via @UNICEF https://t.co/KBt8hVv712

Ending racism, discrimination, xenophobia and intolerance is our shared responsibility.

Here's how you can take action to #FightRacism: https://t.co/PWxqEMS8La https://t.co/NuiWhgHhue

Women & girls are helping to build a better world through their leadership in:
🌱 #ClimateAction
🌱 agriculture
🌱 renewable energy & more

As agents of change, they must be included in creating solutions for a sustainable future: https://t.co/HtoxD8MX3p via @UN_Women https://t.co/493S98vaZt

▶️Conflict
▶️Instability
▶️Climate change
▶️Endemic violence

A series of devastating factors in South Sudan have left an estimated 8.9 million people in need of humanitarian assistance & protection this year.

https://t.co/32LHe449LR via @UNOCHA https://t.co/1I5LWBtQqk

The world must be made a safer place for people working to protect the planet.

-- @UNHumanRights Chief @mbachelet urged countries this week to protect the rights of environmental activists & ensure accountability for attacks. https://t.co/hlnd4UpnRX

Babies are #NotATarget. 

Children are #NotATarget. 

Civilians are #NotATarget. 

Hospitals are #NotATarget.

Health care workers are #NotATarget. 

Schools are #NotATarget. 

Humanitarians are #NotATarget. https://t.co/CyGs0B2J3t

The use of chemical weapons is a grave violation of international law & an affront to our shared humanity, @UN_Disarmament chief @INakamitsu said in Security Council meeting on Syria this week.

She stressed they must never be used again, anywhere. https://t.co/hNszwqBeSV https://t.co/0NmCqwahdz

The UN is made up of dedicated women & men around the world who:

🇺🇳 Feed the hungry
🇺🇳 Vaccinate children
🇺🇳 Promote development
🇺🇳 Protect civilians
🇺🇳 Mediate conflicts
🇺🇳 Support refugees & migrants
🇺🇳 Advance human rights
🇺🇳 Stay & deliver to give hope to those in need https://t.co/FhP8bpx8I5

Ukraine: As the war in the country causes widespread destruction, @UNESCO is working to protect cultural sites & monuments, stressing that safeguarding heritage is a shared responsibility which can help promote peace in the future. https://t.co/tidJP9j0bb

A cluster munition consist of many bomblets which are scattered over wide areas, posing danger to civilians long after conflict ends.  

110 States are parties to the Convention on Cluster Munitions, which prohibits their use under any circumstances. https://t.co/yqRXnz4M1X https://t.co/CXCUv9WeBw

"The targeting of civilians, of residential buildings, hospitals, schools, kindergartens, is inexcusable and intolerable."

-- UN political chief @DicarloRosemary in her briefing to the Security Council on the war in Ukraine. https://t.co/isU2nYo2g9 https://t.co/ECl0CNOOUR

Fossil fuels are a dead end - for our planet, for our humanity & for our economies. 

A well-managed transition to renewables is the only pathway to energy security and green jobs. https://t.co/U8OEgj7EuF https://t.co/4sI2cXd3wF

From recovering better from #COVID19 to taking #ClimateAction, women are key to finding solutions to the world's biggest challenges. 

The #GlobalGoals aim to ensure all women and girls have opportunities to help us build a better future. https://t.co/xhDC9tQEd6 https://t.co/I9Hz5flue0

UNHCR is stepping up humanitarian support for people forced to flee the war in Ukraine by providing shelter, food, cash assistance & much more. 

Details ⤵️ -- via @Refugees 

https://t.co/zPEAgkz1Ln

Women must be given space to lead if Afghanistan is to find peace & progress, says @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet.

More on her visit to the country, where she stressed that girls must be able to attend school & empowered to contribute to their futures.
 https://t.co/XMv9yKOnCq https://t.co/ZHDEP3QftV

"We must do everything we can to find a solution & put an end to this war. 

We must do it now." 

-- UN political chief @DicarloRosemary in her briefing to the Security Council on the war in Ukraine. https://t.co/5VSootKUOx https://t.co/2F7o5IuMv1

Social media poses an existential threat to traditional, trustworthy news, @UNESCO warns, putting our fundamental right to information at risk.

New report shares recommendations to reverse this trend. https://t.co/8VHwIJZibl

The @iaeaorg works to promote the safe, secure & peaceful use of nuclear technologies, and to help prevent the spread of nuclear weapons.

Find out more about their important mission: https://t.co/uwRTXBSmeP https://t.co/EIF3QWpAHZ

The spread of misinformation during a crisis makes it harder for people to understand what's happening.

Not everything we see online is true.

❌ Don't share rumours.
✅ Choose content from reliable sources.

#PledgetoPause and verify facts before sharing.https://t.co/qFqoh7CZOA https://t.co/z90uKNBFOP

"The Russian invasion of Ukraine is just weeks old, yet the human cost is already devastating. 

The UN is committed to deliver for people in need in and around Ukraine, always. 

We need your help."

@MelissaFleming. https://t.co/xjwAUxUxiR

"This is not a left or right or political issue. 
It's an inter-generational justice issue."

-- @UNEP chief @andersen_inger explains why #ClimateAction and climate justice are important for everyone, everywhere. https://t.co/FRlYta2v4O https://t.co/9zc7QwkxVL

1 million children have fled the war in Ukraine.

@UNICEF says it is doing everything it can to help children and families in need; but the only sustainable solution is peace. https://t.co/APNTzYUdK4 https://t.co/3rKpqmYZx9

War in Ukraine calls for international cooperation & solidarity to support everyone affected, and to overcome clear violation of international law, @antonioguterres tells #UNGA. https://t.co/NkMMeHNF5i https://t.co/JjWhRRWt5y

.@WFP is the world's largest provider of school meals for millions of children. 

They offer long term benefits for: 
📚 Education
🍚 Nutrition & health
👧 Gender equality
🌾 Local economies

More on Thursday's International School Meals Day: https://t.co/SWnUQlI4Im https://t.co/tmVuX2fOyD

"This senseless violence must stop.

  End the bloodshed now."

-- @antonioguterres following Wednesday's horrific attack on a hospital in Mariupol, Ukraine, where maternity patients & children are treated. https://t.co/r29zP5ylYy https://t.co/qS1lH8xCNV

Illicit financial flows linked to drug trafficking have far-reaching negative impacts on societies - from corruption to increased organized crime, violence, poverty & inequality.

More in latest report from the International Narcotics Control Board. https://t.co/TA1yfdSgQ6 #INCB https://t.co/rNWYDx6d7v

"We must re-dedicate ourselves to ending this pandemic for all people & all countries, and closing this sad chapter in humanity’s history, once & for all."

-- @antonioguterres on two years of #COVID19. https://t.co/JLkuWtRX3D https://t.co/Z8WE2RxpcQ

This is how you can take care of your kidneys:
⚖️ Maintain a healthy body weight
🥗 Eat a healthy diet
🏃🏽‍♀️ Be active
💧 Drink water
🚭 Don't smoke
❤️ Control your blood pressure
💊 Don't self-medicate

More from @pahowho on Thursday's #WorldKidneyDay: https://t.co/EjJyjIdyMK https://t.co/9DoOI469sU

We need more #WomenInJustice to ensure courts represent everyone they serve & hand down sound judgments.

Thursday is the first-ever International Day of Women Judges. https://t.co/pC7QJoosG1 https://t.co/KMP60wt0vT

Syria: The recent uptick in violence is leading to a deepening humanitarian crisis, with 14.6 million people in need of aide & at risk of abuse.

Renewed efforts are needed to end the nearly 11-year-old conflict. https://t.co/hDDmVkbY1a

The Russian invasion of Ukraine has created a dire humanitarian & refugee crisis. 

The UN is on the ground, supporting the most vulnerable. 

Here's how you can help: https://t.co/z70ULnqzxX

Women bring unique perspectives to the judiciary - yet, they are underrepresented. 

Thursday's first-ever International Day of Women Judges stresses the importance of the full & equal participation of women at all levels of decision-making. https://t.co/pC7QJoosG1 via @UNODC https://t.co/yj0LFmKj4c

Babies are #NotATarget. 

Children are #NotATarget. 

Civilians are #NotATarget. 

Hospitals are #NotATarger.

Health care workers are #NotATarget. 

Schools are #NotATarget. 

Humanitarians are #NotATarget. https://t.co/sDlkTs42vV

Last week, in a historic "Uniting for Peace" session, #UNGA adopted a resolution on Russian aggression in Ukraine. 

Get details here: https://t.co/mkvny9F3LZ https://t.co/45j85hYiam

"Silence the guns — now.

Open the door to dialogue and diplomacy — now."

-- @antonioguterres on the need for peace amid the war in Ukraine. 

📷: The "Knotted Gun" sculpture, at UNHQ in NYC, is a universal symbol of non-violence. https://t.co/Ru2RBuSQ4P

From pregnant women to small children, the United Nations is working to support people whose lives have been uprooted by the war in Ukraine.

See how you can stay informed & support our efforts to help those impacted by the suffering and destruction.

https://t.co/6Weu6o5J3G https://t.co/f7nMYOgGrD
See how the UN showed solidarity with women around the world, while also honouring their contributions to our future on Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay. https://t.co/ERKf9j7bE9

Half the world's people already suffer from water shortages for part of the year. The climate crisis will only worsen this trend. 

We need urgent & united #ClimateAction now. 

More from @WMO: https://t.co/ssoGpmrqay
 https://t.co/V8x8PD5nPE

Women and girls in Afghanistan have been disproportionately impacted by conflict, drought & economic instability.

On Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay we are sharing their stories & remain committed to supporting equal rights and opportunities for all.

https://t.co/gYUq44Czsn https://t.co/4ezWyuNukX

2 million people have fled the war in Ukraine.

This is now the fastest growing refugee crisis in Europe since World War II.

UNHCR is working to provide humanitarian aid to those in need. 

You can support their efforts: https://t.co/fPXMh4H71T via @Refugees https://t.co/2YSmVdGMPP

On #InternationalWomensDay, watch @AminaJMohammed, @unwomenchief and other women leaders & activists discuss how we can all take action to realize women's rights, ensure equal representation & end gender-based violence: https://t.co/qYJEAMxJbJ #IWD2022 https://t.co/jzPWhhI97d

Ukraine: As the war claims more lives, @UNHumanRights chief @MBachelet calls for greater efforts to protect trapped civilians.

UN humanitarians say more must be done to ensure safe passage to get civilians out, and aid workers in. https://t.co/EJzTtOBwPv

Displaced women & girls are at an increased risk of gender-based violence, including sexual exploitation and abuse. 

Our colleagues from UNHCR are working to protect women & girls forced to flee conflict in Ukraine. https://t.co/rzrdG8GKwZ via @Refugees #IWD2022 https://t.co/One2vZ0H4v

The crisis in Ukraine has impacts on food security well beyond the country's borders.

The region is one of the world’s most important areas for production of items like wheat & corn. 

@WFP explains potential global consequences.
https://t.co/aDSS3jl6hb https://t.co/zU0KpXew9N

On Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay, @UN_Women explains how the climate crisis disproportionately impacts women & girls, why gender equality is key to #ClimateAction, and what YOU can do to support solutions for women, by women. https://t.co/S326CkWTtG https://t.co/mkFwvM27Ng

What we share online can have consequences in the real world.

There is a lot of misinformation spreading right now, which can result in people being left uninformed & can put lives at risk during a crisis.

#PledgeToPause and verify facts before sharing. https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/zL8tWz8g1u

Realizing women's equal rights is key to achieving all the #GlobalGoals, the world's to-do list for a better future for all.

See how you can help make gender equality a reality: https://t.co/5DnerO17dZ #IWD2022 https://t.co/QIBh4DjUbo

Refugee rights are human rights. 

As millions of people around the world flee violence, persecution, war or disaster at home, we can all stand #WithRefugees. https://t.co/tlL4sEKG3p via @Refugees https://t.co/X9hfVmMMoM

"We need to turn the clock forward on women’s rights.
The time is now."

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay. https://t.co/y8v4ozVd5s https://t.co/4SMd0kt9Gr

"We’re failing to meet the needs of civilians today, at this time. I hope we will not fail them tomorrow."

-- @UNReliefChief outlined immediate humanitarian priorities for Ukraine in Security Council briefing. https://t.co/7Cpqf8vFRX

On Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay, join us in standing in solidarity with the women of Ukraine. 

Their specific needs must be prioritized in the humanitarian response.

See what @UN_Women is doing to help: https://t.co/CzWzyiqhv8 https://t.co/aQ2qNHIE8s
The International Court of Justice opens public hearings on the situation in Ukraine, amid calls for emergency measures to stop the conflict. via @CIJ_ICJ https://t.co/nZOvUfUMNE

“We need to do everything possible to avert a nuclear accident." 

-- @iaeaorg chief @rafaelmgrossi warns about grave dangers as questions arise about operational control of nuclear power plants in Ukraine. https://t.co/fQaQMdYIB9

97% of Afghans are at risk of plunging into poverty.

Through cash for work initiatives, @UNDP has supported more than 70,000 men & women by providing job opportunities, while also helping to restore vital community infrastructure. https://t.co/wX8v5PrbdH

Paid maternity leave is a universal human right. 

Yet, only 98 out of 185 countries have maternity leave laws that provide mothers adequate protection.

Learn more from @ilo ahead of Tuesday's #InternationalWomensDay: https://t.co/dlXMJspKu3 https://t.co/eQLZRf84fK

"Imagine a world where every job is based on clean, renewable energy, where wind & solar power is even more abundant."

-- @UNEP Young Champion of the Earth @nzambimatee_ke explains the role of sustainable energy in building a better future. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA #ClimateAction https://t.co/q2u8z14h6M

The #GlobalGoals are our blueprint to achieve a better & more sustainable world.

Learn more about the 17 Goals created to transform our future. https://t.co/Ss4uMcXdcV https://t.co/JzmZlkSGZ5

Ethiopia: More than 1.6 million people have been displaced due to the ongoing conflict. Many are facing critical levels of food insecurity. 

@Refugees is seeking US$ 205 million to deliver life-saving assistance to those in need. https://t.co/yXpcCX5Jy1

For more than 75 years, the UN has worked to promote a more peaceful existence for all.

Learn about our efforts to create a world in which every person can live in safety & security. https://t.co/ljczAy18eh https://t.co/GFdYEtKqTH

"We need peace now." 

At an emergency meeting of the UN General Assembly on the situation in Ukraine this past week, @antonioguterres said war is not the answer, as he called for an immediate end to the conflict. https://t.co/e5pbfz7WhE

➡️ Humanity
➡️ Neutrality
➡️ Impartiality
➡️ Independence

These are the 4 principles guiding the UN's humanitarian work.
https://t.co/j2xELzTSGZ https://t.co/cJhdS2qgqR

📷: The "Good Defeats Evil" Sculpture at UNHQ depicts St. George slaying a dragon created from fragments of nuclear missiles.

To achieve a peaceful and sustainable future, the world must be free of nuclear weapons. https://t.co/UhqoC7oNOf

"Every fraction of a degree matters.
Every voice can make a difference.
And every second counts."

-- @antonioguterres renewed his call for urgent #ClimateAction this week following release of @IPCC_CH climate report. https://t.co/Fjm6b5EJkz https://t.co/B31bvRahTb

Each of us has a role to play to prevent and #FightRacism.

From speaking up and spreading words of tolerance and compassion to volunteering in support of vulnerable groups, we can all stand up for our common humanity: https://t.co/PWxqEMAxTC https://t.co/NCcTYViNvn

3 billion people are still waiting for their first #COVID19 vaccine. This inequity threatens the safety of the entire word.

Until there is vaccine equity, global recovery from the pandemic remains out of reach. https://t.co/Ikh0LkQpCi https://t.co/zw6lPM2vzL

More than 1 million people have now fled Ukraine to seek safety, and millions more are likely to join them.

New data portal from @Refugees has up-to-date, reliable information on the crisis. https://t.co/DB2bseaWYl https://t.co/4hF1DDx4s7

Stop killing and injuring children.
Children in Ukraine are being profoundly traumatized by the violence all around them.
They need peace now.
https://t.co/sETrcYTOBd via @UNICEF https://t.co/lDnnOeWDcX

"The mere idea of a nuclear conflict is simply inconceivable.

Nothing can justify the use of nuclear weapons."

-- @antonioguterres at #UNGA special session on situation in Ukraine. https://t.co/QvH6np6Yi8 https://t.co/rQGjwx4NaM

📷: The UN emblem - pictured here in the #UNGA Hall - is an inspirational symbol that represents people's hopes and dreams for a world united for peace.

More about our emblem: https://t.co/dvBBPeY4Sc https://t.co/lraOleoEIO

"Silence the guns — now.

Open the door to dialogue and diplomacy — now."

-- @antonioguterres on the need for peace amid the conflict in Ukraine. 

📷: The "Knotted Gun" sculpture, at UNHQ in NYC, is a universal symbol of non-violence. https://t.co/gOHXiISO09

In historic "Uniting for Peace" session, #UNGA adopted a resolution this week demanding that Russia immediately cease its use of force against Ukraine and withdraw its military forces. https://t.co/mkvny9nsnp https://t.co/AuWcWOuwCP

When and how is a new @UNPeacekeeping operation formed?

The Security Council decides on new missions and their mandates. 

Get more details here: https://t.co/yS5VxBfWQR https://t.co/ClpUA8SOof
Ukraine: Follow our dedicated site to see the latest information on how the UN is working to help those affected by the conflict and how you can support their efforts.  https://t.co/UtuZqHXih7

141 in favor
   5 against
 35 abstentions

This week, countries adopted a resolution during an historic "Uniting for Peace" #UNGA session. 

The resolution demands that Russia immediately ceases use of force against Ukraine & withdraws its military forces. https://t.co/mkvny9F3LZ https://t.co/fWsyIS1LXy

Ending the pandemic and building resilience against the next outbreak are key to achieving the #GlobalGoals, @AminaJMohammed told leaders at the Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development.

https://t.co/naNnozBRSI

From pregnant women to small children, the United Nations is working to support people whose lives have been uprooted by the conflict in Ukraine.

See how you can stay informed & support our efforts to help those impacted by the suffering and destruction. https://t.co/6Weu6o5J3G

"Military operations around nuclear sites & other critical civilian infrastructure are not only unacceptable, but highly irresponsible."

- UN political chief @DicarloRosemary briefs Security Council following Russian strikes on Ukrainian nuclear facility. https://t.co/mkM29JUXcG

Ukraine: UN Human Rights Council adopts resolution calling for the withdrawal of Russian troops and the creation of an independent commission to investigate possible human rights violations. https://t.co/oY8UDXHzsv https://t.co/JCHL0XLOsx

War is not the answer.

We need peace now.
 
As the situation in Ukraine worsens, @antonioguterres says he will continue to do everything he can to contribute to an immediate cessation of hostilities. https://t.co/e5pbfyQlq6

📸: @UNESCO https://t.co/zyhTHmtmic

The spread of misinformation during a crisis makes it harder for people to understand what's happening.

Not everything we see online is true.

❌ Don't share rumours.
✅ Choose content from reliable sources.

#PledgetoPause and verify facts before sharing.https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/qekiOtszUC

➡️Humanity
➡️Neutrality
➡️Impartiality
➡️Independence

From natural disasters to armed conflict, @WFP remains committed to these four humanitarian principles while providing life-saving assistance to people around the world. https://t.co/RPWWkYJNUt
 https://t.co/fN5vLmYrpq

▶️ Heart disease
▶️ Diabetes
▶️ Cancer

Being overweight or obese can lead to serious health problems.

@WHO explains how to prevent them on Friday's #WorldObesityDay: https://t.co/spNkm4PXUx https://t.co/0VOPHj3bHo

Ukraine: Escalating conflict is putting the lives & wellbeing of 7.5 million children at risk.

They are being profoundly traumatized; families are being separated & needs are growing by the hour.

You can help @UNICEF scale up life-saving support.
https://t.co/Uvw96vHDWn

Worldwide obesity has nearly tripled since 1975, with about 40% of adults considered overweight & another 13% obese.

More from @WHO on Friday's #WorldObesityDay: https://t.co/swRmMNbOes https://t.co/PmOEPXbGvX
